alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lauderdale, southwestern Colbert and northwestern Franklin Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 422 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tishomingo State Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Cherokee, Littleville, Malone, Posey Loop, Pogo, Mt Hester and Srygley Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
